# Controller Boundary

This module represents the Controller authority as defined in Canon v0.1.

Responsibilities:
- Authorizes all state changes
- Orchestrates intake, evaluation, tension creation, revision, and invariant enforcement
- Emits audit events

Prohibitions:
- Must not implement epistemic logic
- Must not bypass hard invariant enforcement
- Must not resolve underspecified canon areas

This file is a boundary marker only. No implementation permitted at IM-2.
